joelib2.io.types.cml
Class CMLSequentialSAXReader

java.lang.Object
  joelib2.io.types.cml.CMLSequentialSAXReader

public class CMLSequentialSAXReader
extends Object

Sequential reader for Chemical Markup Language (CML) files.

Author:
  • Jörg Kurt Wegner.

  2. Article (mr01), P. Murray--Rust & H. S. Rzepa, Chemical Markup, XML and the World--Wide Web. 2. Information Objects and the CMLDOM , J. Chem. Inf. Comput. Sci., 2001 , 41 , 1113-1123 . DOI: 10.1021/ci000404a.
